name: The Kid Who Stole Christmas
description:
Barney lost a bunch of hats. Dad's always in a bad mood. You're the elf who has to report to Santa about whether Barney has been naughty or nice this year, and it's not looking good.

This was made during Global Game Jam 2021. Created with PowerQuest for Unity, a 2D Adventure Game Tool made by Dave Lloyd.

We are a team of musicians, so we have all been doing jobs we don’t usually do! If you find any bugs (we finished this up super quick), contact @indiegames_muso on Twitter. (Or for a hint.) Some people have had trouble with the Mac build. Try The Unarchiver. Or ping Meg on @indiegames_muso. Thanks for playing!

Mac-specific

Try using The Unarchiver

Also note that if running Catalina you will need to bypass GateKeeper by right-
clicking the .app, then hold shift and click “open”. It will complain at you.
Repeat it and it will offer to open properly.
